title: Calories in Cooked Ground Turkey
meta_description: Discover calories in cooked ground turkey per 100 g, including protein, fat, carbs, full nutrition breakdown, and preparation tweaks for better tracking.
assumptions: 93% lean ground turkey, cooked (pan-fried without added oil), no seasonings, salt, or binders.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by fat content, cooking method, added ingredients, and brand. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 100 g of cooked ground turkey provides ~150 kcal and ~27 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp oil during cooking per 100 g
Include breadcrumbs and egg for meatballs (per 100 g cooked)

faqs.q: How many calories in 100 g cooked ground turkey?
faqs.a: Approximately 150 kcal for 93% lean, cooked without added fat.

faqs.q: What's the protein content in cooked ground turkey?
faqs.a: About 27 g protein per 100 g serving.

faqs.q: Does cooking method affect calories in ground turkey?
faqs.a: Yesâ€”frying with oil adds calories; baking or grilling keeps it lower.

faqs.q: How does fat percentage impact calories in cooked ground turkey?
faqs.a: Leaner (99%) is ~120 kcal/100 g; regular (85% lean) ~200 kcal/100 g.

faqs.q: Are carbs present in cooked ground turkey?
faqs.a: No carbs, fiber, or sugars in plain cooked ground turkey (0 g each).
